title: Some friends of mine,
author: Lucas, E. V.
snippet: When at the bar, Lords Newton and Hermand were great friends, and many were the convivial meetings they enjoyed together.

title: Strong Mac,
author: Crockett, S. R.

title: Memorials of his time,
author: Cockburn, Henry Cockburn
snippet: Hermand first refused u to try a child." After this was driven out of him, the indictment, which described the occurrence and said that the prisoner had slain the deceased " wickedly and feloniously/ 7 was read 5 and Hermand then said, " Well, my young friend, this is not true, is it ? Are you guilty or not guilty ?" u Not guilty, my Lord." "I ll be sworn you re not!" In spite of all his exertions, his young friend was convicted of culpable homicide ; for which he was sentenced to a few days 7 imprisonment.
